2. From each row, find the column "high assists" to see how many assists were made by each player during that game. For game 60, Rondo had 17 assists according to the cell with row_index = 12 and column_name = 'high assists'.

3. To determine if Rondo has the most assists in any other game, repeat step 2 for each game (rows 1-11) and compare the number of assists to the number of assists Rondo had against Indiana.

4. After comparing all the games, it is evident that no one else had more assists than Rondo in the game against Indiana.
